text: Ba kasone, ki ʙa on ci Alloh az fazli xes ʙa onon dodaast, ʙuxl mevarzand, gumon naʙarand, ki on ʙuxl ʙaroi onon ʙehtarast, ʙalki ʙa zijoni onhost. Va dar ruzi qijomat, cize ki dar on ʙuxl varzidaand, saʙaʙi azoʙason megardad va ʙaroi Alloh ast hamai doroihoi osmon va zamin. Pas nafaqa kuned az on ci ki Alloh ruziaton dod, zero ʙozgasti hama umur ʙa sui Alloh ast va ʙaroi ruzi oxirati xud xajrxohi kuned, ki naf'i on, ruzi qijomat ʙa sumo merasad va Alloh ʙa on ci mekuned ogoh ast
